import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navigation', templateUrl: './navigation.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navigation.component.scss'] }) export class NavigationComponent { navLinks = [ {label: "Home", url: ""}, {label: "About me", url: "/about-me"}, {label: "Contacts", url: "/contacts"}, ] }
